title: Firewater Discography
description:
Discography of Firewater, ex-Cop Shoot Cop vocalist Tod Ashley's project. Get Off the Cross... and Ponzi Scheme comprised a multitude of musicians whose reputations were already established in the underground scene: Duane Denison (Jesus Lizard), Yuval Gabay (Soul Coughing), Jim Kimball (Laughing Hyenas), David Ouimet (Motherhead Bug), Hahn Rowe (Hugo Largo), Jennifer Charles (Elysian Fields), Jane Scarpantoni (Tiny Lights) and Kurt Hoffman (Boss Hog)

contains:
1996 - Get Off the Cross...We Need the Wood for the Fire
1998 - The Ponzi Scheme
2001 - Psychopharmacology
2003 - The Man on the Burning Tightrope
2004 - Songs We Should Have Written
2008 - The Golden Hour
2012 - International Orange!

v0 mp3
